trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when a password cannot be retrieved from the password store.
trans-unit.target: 無法從密碼存放區擷取密碼時，所擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A description of the reason for the exception.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordException" /> class and sets the <see cref="P:System.Exception.Message" /> property to the supplied <paramref name="message" />.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordException" /> 類別的新執行個體，並將 <see cref="P:System.Exception.Message" /> 屬性設定為所提供的 <paramref name="message" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />，包含所擲回之例外狀況的相關序列化物件資料。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 包含有關來源或目的端內容資訊的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordException" /> class with the supplied serialization information and context.
trans-unit.target: 使用所提供的序列化資訊和內容，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A description of the reason for the exception.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordException" /> class and sets the <see cref="P:System.Exception.Message" /> property to the supplied <paramref name="message" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Exception.InnerException" /> property to the supplied <paramref name="innerException" />.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordException" /> 類別的新執行個體，並將 <see cref="P:System.Exception.Message" /> 屬性設定為提供的 <paramref name="message" />，以及將 <see cref="P:System.Exception.InnerException" /> 屬性設定為提供的 <paramref name="innerException" />。
